title: The Power to fly: the history and development of the flying machine
creator_credit: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films and Bob Privett
brief_description: The centuries of trial and error during which man acquired the power to fly. Leonardo da Vinci’s studies of bird flight; Sir George Cayley and the first glider; Stringfellow flies a steam-driven model in 1848; the Wright brothers’ first powered flight in 1903; rapid progress from 1914 to 1918; the passenger carrying biplane; the airplane comes of age; fighter design and high-octane fuels during the Second World War; the jet engine and super sonic flight.
